share-flash.name: Share Target Flash
share-flash.hint: Shows the flash effect on target to all users (disabled show to only the person targetting)

player-color.name: Target uses Player Color
player-color.hint: For the target flash, use the player color (overrides any custom set colors)

scale-on-%-hp.name: Scale Damage/Heal Duration
scale-on-%-hp.hint: Scale damage/healing duration based on the percent of health change

duration.name: Duration
duration.hint: How long (in ms) should the token flashing be for all effects (Default 500 ms, this will scaled if you toggle on settings that scale duration)

ring.name: Token Ring Auto Color
ring.hint: Select if the module should change the dynamic token ring color

background.name: Token Background Auto Color
background.hint: Select if the module should change the dynamic token background color

health-targets.name: Health-Based Token Applies To
health-targets.hint: If Health-Based auto coloring is enabled, this can be set to only apply to actors by their disposition.

percent-color.name: Token Auto Color Percentage
percent-color.hint: How much should the saturation of the autocoloring be

damage.name: [Color] Damage
damage.hint: Change the color the token flashes on damage

healing.name: [Color] Healing
healing.hint: Change the color the token flashes on healing

target.name: [Color] Target
target.hint: Change the color the token flashes on targeting (assuming you don't have the player color setting enabled)

positive.name: [Color] Positive Condition
positive.hint: Change the color the token flashes on receiving a positive condition

negative.name: [Color] Negative Condition
negative.hint: Change the color the token flashes on receiving a negative condition
